EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Email_SpringOneTour_Q119.01 EMEA SpringOne Tour Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Register for SpringOne Tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Join us at SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/2019?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=e1-s1t-default]]>, which takes place in London, Amsterdam, Paris and Istanbul this Spring. These are Java developer community events that will bring the best Cloud-Native java content from our flagship conference directly to you. If you are working on a Spring application, you'll have the opportunity to learn from and share with members of the Spring community <[[https://springonetour.io/2019/speakers?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=e1-s1t-spring-community-default]]>.
Over the course of two days, you’ll see the latest technology and participate in open discussions about all things Spring. You will also hear about related technologies like Kubernetes, Cloud Foundry, Concourse, and RabbitMQ too.
Cloud computing ushered in a software renaissance, and Spring has never been more relevant. So why not come to learn and share your experiences with other members of the Spring community at this unique event?
Register today <[[https://springonetour.io/2019?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=e1-s1t-2-default]]>. Use discount code S1Tour2019_100 for £50/€50 off ticket price of £150/€150. We hope to see you there. If you can’t make it to SpringOne Tour, here are all our upcoming events <[[https://pivotal.io/events?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=e1-events-default]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[https://pivotal.io/subscription-management]]>.
